items.sentence: Mary's sickness does not stop her from enjoying life.
It's a picture of Mary and her long-haired boyfriend.
Tom goes to see Mary in the hospital every other day.
I'm not sure that that's what Tom and Mary both want.
Let me know when you are leaving. We can go together.
You know I wouldn't permit Tom to do that, don't you?
If you get bored, read one of the books Tom gave you.
Tom told Mary that her boyfriend was looking for her.
That isn't the only reason why Tom needed to do that.
I'd like to know who that guy standing over there is.
